channel.description: Recent content in Dotnettips.wordpress.com on .NET Ramblings

item.title: 256 Seconds with dotNetDave: Handling Exceptions Part 1 â€“ Reusable Assemblies
item.description: This content discusses exception handling in Microsoft .NET, focusing on application layer and reusable assemblies. It offers insights on preventing exceptions and notifying calling code, and references a related book. The principles are noted to be applicable to other programming languages. Link to article: https://dotnettips.wordpress.com/2024/06/03/256-seconds-with-dotnetdave-handling-exceptions-part-1-in-reusable-assemblies/

item.title: Serializing Objects: Efficient Serialization and Deserialization of Collections with JsonSerializer
item.description: The article demonstrates the ease of serializing and deserializing collections using JsonSerializer. Link to article: https://dotnettips.wordpress.com/2024/06/03/serializing-objects-efficient-serialization-and-deserialization-of-collections-with-jsonserializer/

item.title: Code It Any Way You Want: Comparing Key Search Methods in Dictionaries
item.description: This article compares two key search methods in dictionaries: using Contains() on the Keys collection and ContainsKey() method directly on the dictionary. It demonstrates examples for both approaches, highlighting Microsoft's recommendation of using ContainsKey(). The article suggests further examination of the performance aspect of these methods. Link to article: https://dotnettips.wordpress.com/2024/05/30/code-it-any-way-you-want-comparing-key-search-methods-in-dictionaries/
